category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > Sub-1 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.spirit2
short_description: SPIRIT 2 Click features the SP1ML-915, an ultra-low power, fully integrated RF module, which operates at 915 MHz ISM band. This Click boardâ„¢ can be used to add wireless connectivity to any application, requiring no extensive RF communication experience. The module integrates all the required components, including the 32-bit STM32L1 MCU, a compact chip antenna, and accompanying circuitry. The SP1ML-915 module supports several types of modulation schemes, including 2-FSK, GFSK, GMSK, OOK, and ASK, allowing it to fulfill different RF transmission requirements.
